channel.title: Client/Server Xbox Live.. Wierd thing
channel.description: Ok, Well.. if you have a xbox live profile you'll know kinda of where I'm getting. Alright, so I know this guy that Mods Profile and all kinds of game and stuff on xbox.. He's not the brightest crayon in the box.. But he knows how to mod. He says whenever he logs into a file it downloads it on the hdd (I'm not doubting that) but the thing is he says after the password is changed you can still log into it. I was trying to explain that the servers wouldn't let you because you dont have a password. But he goes on to explain that he doesn't know the folder structure (wtf) and then he says the profile folder is like "FFFE8495FGGJF" then a subfolder like "EFFF0149HHG" then like a file like "00010000" or some shit like that. And claims that you can still log into the account without a password (on live).

item.title: Client/Server Xbox Live.. Wierd thing
item.dc:creator: @soul_raever soul raever
item.description:
@soul_raever wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:16, topic:296661”][quote author=soul raever link=topic=392646.msg2923258#msg2923258 date=1250877415]

Back on topic:

The typo of crown means you missed a letter (a), exchanged a letter (y-w), and reordered it (wo - ow).

If you type like most were taught to, w and y are typed using different fingers. So unless your brain sends signals to the wrong side of your body (left brain sending the message to your left hand to press w), it was deliberate.

you was taught to type??
wow that must have been some boring lessons…
[/quote]
no you learn to type that is the logical manner and the proper manner[/quote]
STH says “like most were taught to”
implying that there was lessons which in my opinion would be boring as hell

Read full topic
